pageTitle: Drogba: A great feeling | News | Official Site | Chelsea Football Club
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {72053=The affection of the Stamford Bridge faithful was secured through a host of influential displays, all manner of important goals and, of course, the penalty which saw us crowned champions of Europe in 2012., 45991=Away Shirt 2015/16 White, 71243=Drogba was initially brought to the club in the summer of 2004, one of Mourinho’s first signings as Chelsea manager, and the pair have since gone on to forge a special relationship., 42786=Away Shirt 2015/16 White with Ivanovic ..., 43542=Away Shirt 2015/16 White with Special 1..., 44650=Away Shorts 2015/16 - Kids White, 73147=news Tue 29 Jul 2014}
